stages.text: Once upon a time, there was a mother and her lovely young daughter who lived quietly in a rustic hut at the foot of Yoshinoyama mountains.
Even though they lived a hard life, the girl's soft beauty was a familiar thing from all over the village.
One day, a wealthy samurai named Tamiya came on a spying trip.
His suave look, cultured talk, and the mellifluous flow of Edo-kotoba soon made him gain her confidence.
Til the day, he won her trust completely, thinking she was the one who would secure his future.
But when Tamiya was commanded to go back to the shogun, his fear of being caught in an affair by his real wife made him brutal.
He killed both mother and daughter, set their house on fire under the cover of night, making the killings look like a tragic accident.
He thought that the truth had become ashes. However, the girl's grudge did not perish.
She died with the agony of realizing the person she loved most was the one who destroyed her… and she returned as an Onryō.
